name: cagents
description: Universal multi-domain agent system with 231 specialized agents. V8.0 features: Claude Code hooks system (12 hook types, 4 implementations), progressive skill disclosure (9 SKILL.md agents), 4-tier model routing (Haiku/Sonnet/Opus with project overrides), comprehensive security review (20+ secret patterns), session management (waypoints, recovery, three-file pattern), metrics infrastructure (config, session, daily tracking), evaluation framework (quality, completeness, coordination evals), CI/CD scripts (cagents-ci.sh, run-evals.sh, check-quality.sh), skill creator scripts (init_agent.js, validate_agent.js), and instinct-based pattern learning. CSV-based task inventory for large-scale workflows (60-80% context savings), batch delegation, checkpoint/resume. Features aggressive task decomposition, controller-centric question-based delegation across 5 super-domains (Make, Grow, Operate, People, Serve). Parallel execution (50x speedup), recursive workflows, comprehensive work breakdowns, dependency mapping.
